entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @VP All you're trying to do is justify Trump holding an indoor rally in a state where COVID-19 is on the rise. You know this is contrary to the White House and CDC COVID guidelines. You know this puts lives at risk. But Trump doesn't care. You don't care. You both are despicable.
